## R Markdown

Do the combi thing



``` {r trigrams, eval = TRUE}
tri_trigrams <- read.csv(file = "/Users/mutecypher/Documents/Documents - Michael’s iMac/Coursera/Capstone Project/20sample/tri_gram_s_s.csv" ,colClasses = c( NA, NA, NA, NA) )
tri_trigrams <- data.table(tri_trigrams)
combi_tri_s_s <- unite(tri_trigrams, bigrams, c("word1", "word2"), sep = " ")
rm(tri_trigrams)
write.csv(combi_tri_s_s,file = "/Users/mutecypher/Documents/Documents - Michael’s iMac/Coursera/Capstone Project/20sample/combi_tri_s_s.csv" )
rm(combi_tri_s_s)
```
